title: anbE AnandamAm
sahitya:
anbE AnandamAm saDagOpar attaittinrAngi irundE arivuDan purinda nal


anupallavi

  unparam ennuLLE tanparam poruL kUDi inbam iduvE enru nambum parAnkusharin


caraNam    tEnum pAlum cIniyum teLinda rasamum pOlE tittikkum amudanai cittattilE kalandE
yAnum mugguNaccagandAnum kadir virinda vAnum uyirai Alum kOnum hari tAn enum
